content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(41, -82)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (no other mining drills found) 

### Copper cable factory
No factory found

### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of 
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drill has no fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has a fuel source before starting the mining operation.

### Errors when stone furnace has no fuel
- Ensure that the stone furnace has a fuel source before starting the smelting operation.

### Errors when burner inserter has no fuel
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a fuel source before starting the inserting operation.

### Errors when stone furnace has no ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the necessary ingredients before starting the smelting operation.

### Errors when offshore pump is working but boiler has no fuel
- Ensure that the boiler has a fuel source before starting the offshore pump.

### Errors when steam engine is not connected
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the electricity network before starting the steam engine.

### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Ensure that the pipe group has a fluid source before starting the pipe group operation.

### Errors when electricity group is not plugged in electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged in the electric network before starting the electricity group operation.

### Errors when belt group is empty
- Ensure that the belt group has an item source before starting the belt group operation.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
No important variables assigned by the agent.
